verses.verse: Thus said<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, Go<WH1980>, and buy<WH7069> a potter<WH3335>'s earthen<WH2789> bottle<WH1228>, and take of the elders<WH2205> of the people<WH5971>, and of the elders<WH2205> of the priests<WH3548>;

and go forth<WH3318> unto the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, which is by the entry<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> Harsith<WH2777>, and proclaim<WH7121> there the words<WH1697> that I shall tell thee<WH1696>;

and say<WH559>, Hear<WH8085> ye the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>, O kings<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, and inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>: thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Behold<WH935>, I will bring evil<WH7451> upon this place<WH4725>, which whosoever heareth<WH8085>, his ears<WH241> shall tingle<WH6750>.

Because they have forsaken<WH5800> me<WH5234>, and have estranged this place<WH4725>, and have burned incense<WH6999> in it unto other<WH312> gods<WH430>, that they knew<WH3045> not<WH1>, they and their fathers and the kings<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>; and have filled<WH4390> this place<WH4725> with the blood<WH1818> of innocents<WH5355>,

and have built<WH1129> the high places<WH1116> of Baal<WH1168>, to burn<WH8313> their sons<WH1121> in the fire<WH784> for burnt-offerings<WH5930> unto Baal<WH1168>; which I commanded<WH6680> not<WH1696>, nor spake it<WH5927>, neither came it into my mind<WH3820>:

therefore <WH3117>, behold, the days come<WH935>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that this place<WH4725> shall no more be called<WH7121> Topheth<WH8612>, nor The valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, but The valley<WH1516> of Slaughter<WH2028>.

And I will make void<WH1238> the counsel<WH6098> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389> in this place<WH4725>; and I will cause them to fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719> before<WH6440> their enemies<WH341>, and by the hand<WH3027> of them that seek<WH1245> their life<WH5315>: and their dead bodies<WH5038> will I give<WH5414> to be food<WH3978> for the birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064>, and for the beasts<WH929> of the earth<WH776>.

And I will make<WH7760> this city<WH5892> an astonishment<WH8047>, and a hissing<WH8322>; every one that passeth<WH5674> thereby shall be astonished<WH8074> and hiss<WH8319> because of all the plagues thereof<WH4347>.

And I will cause them to eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of their sons<WH1121> and the flesh<WH1320> of their daughters<WH1323>; and they shall eat<WH398> every one<WH376> the flesh<WH1320> of his friend<WH7453>, in the siege<WH4692> and in the distress<WH4689>, wherewith their enemies<WH341>, and they that seek<WH1245> their life<WH5315>, shall distress them<WH6693>.
Then shalt thou break<WH7665> the bottle<WH1228> in the sight<WH5869> of the men<WH582> that go with thee<WH1980>,

and shalt say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: Even so<WH3602> will I break<WH7665> this people<WH5971> and this city<WH5892>, as one breaketh<WH7665> a potter<WH3335>'s vessel<WH3627>, that cannot<WH3201> be made whole again<WH7495>; and they shall bury<WH6912> in Topheth<WH8612>, till there be no place<WH4725> to bury<WH6912>.
Thus will I do<WH6213> unto this place<WH4725>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and to the inhabitants<WH3427> thereof<WH5414>, even making this city<WH5892> as Topheth<WH8612>:

and the houses<WH1004> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and the houses<WH1004> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, which are defiled<WH2931>, shall be as the place<WH4725> of Topheth<WH8612>, even all the houses<WH1004> upon whose roofs<WH1406> they have burned incense<WH6999> unto all the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064>, and have poured out<WH5258> drink-offerings<WH5262> unto other<WH312> gods<WH430>.

Then came<WH935> Jeremiah<WH3414> from Topheth<WH8612>, whither Jehovah<WH3068> had sent<WH7971> him to prophesy<WH5012>; and he stood<WH5975> in the court<WH2691> of Jehovah<WH3068>'s house<WH1004>, and said<WH559> to all the people<WH5971>:

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Behold<WH935>, I will bring upon this city<WH5892> and upon all its towns<WH5892> all the evil<WH7451> that I have pronounced<WH1696> against it<WH6203>; because they have made their neck stiff<WH7185>, that they may not hear<WH8085> my words<WH1697>.
